definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Ginger has powerful anti-inflammatory properties and can slow cancer growth. Turmeric, the spice that forms the base of most curries, is from a root in the ginger family.
sentences.chinese: 姜具有强大的抗炎功能，能减缓肿瘤的生长。

sentences.english: A strong wind blows the beer can into the river.
sentences.chinese: 一阵强大的风把啤酒罐吹到了河里面了。

sentences.english: We are reading the Shuobo and partial expert scholar, a strong lineup.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在读硕博及部分专家学者，阵容强大。

sentences.english: The feedback will become so strong it destroys the wormhole.
sentences.chinese: 反馈变得很强大而毁坏了虫洞。

sentences.english: Chaos Hydras are the most powerful creature of the Fortresses.
sentences.chinese: 远古巨兽是据点里最强大的生物。

sentences.english: The bursts have much more energy than the normal local variations in temperature.
sentences.chinese: 这样的爆发具备相比常规温变强大的多的能量。

sentences.english: Love is a great wrecker of peace of mind.
sentences.chinese: 爱情对平和心境有强大破坏力。

sentences.english: The strong pressure of public opinion has caused her nervous breakdown.
sentences.chinese: 强大的舆论压力导致了她的精神崩溃。

sentences.english: But the internal inertia against doing so appears too great at this time.
sentences.chinese: 但反对这种作为的内部惰性这次似乎显得太过强大了。

sentences.english: Mentally strong people recognize that they don't need to please everyone all the time.
sentences.chinese: 内心强大之人深知随时溜须拍马毫无必要。

sentences.english: Because of good land has been strong in the pre-developer "carve up" the.
sentences.chinese: 由于良好的土地已被强大的前开发商“瓜分”了。
他有没有“强大的”进攻性网络武器？

sentences.english: Inspite of a small set of challenges, cloud provides a powerful platform for testing.
sentences.chinese: 尽管有一些问题，云提供了测试的强大平台。

sentences.english: It will also have more memory and a more powerful graphics processor, they said.
sentences.chinese: 它将拥有更多的内存以及更强大的图形处理器。

sentences.english: Democratic government gradually take the place of an all-powerful monarchy.
sentences.chinese: 民主政府逐渐取代了强大的君主制。

sentences.english: Description Dietary Supplement Alpha Lipoic Acid is a powerful sulfur containing ingredient.
sentences.chinese: 描述膳食补充剂硫辛酸是一种强大的含硫成分。

definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
small and weak/puny/the small and weak/children/women and children
to rely on sth (for support etc)/to depend on
weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than
